CLI Overview

This page documents the global CLI arguments for Bvalcalc. For specific modes like –site or –genome, see the usage pages in the sidebar.

Welcome to Bvalcalc! Please specify a mode to calculate B.

usage: bvalcalc [-h] [--generate_params [SPECIES]] [--dir DIR] [--genome] [--region REGION] [--gene] [--site]

Named Arguments

--generate_params

Possible choices: selfing, human, drosophila, arabidopsis, mouse, pfalciparum, celegans, template

Generate popgen params for a given species from one of the default templates.

--dir, -d

Directory to write the generated params file (default: current directory)

Default: '.'

--genome, -w

Compute B values genome-wide

Default: False

--region, -r

Compute B values for a specified chromosomal region [CHR:START-END]

--gene, -g

Compute B values for a region adjacent to a selected element

Default: False

--site, -s

Compute B values for a single site

Default: False
